pages.title: Runic Snares
pages.text: Small chains that vanish on contact. If a creature is hit by a snare, it has a 20% chance to be inflicted by the status Frail Soul for 10 to 20 seconds. When a mob with this effect is struck by a Glass Dagger, the effect is removed instantly and an Incomplete Catalyst is spawned.
Status effects cannot be applied to bosses (such as the Ender Dragon and the Wither) so they require a different method.
